post.body: nice... I still need to watch SAC, I've only seen maybe about 20 minutes total of the first episode but I was blown away
Nightmare!! did anything happen to it? I had my power button break but I could still use it; I am terrified of screen failure!
have you watched Appleseed: Ex Machina yet? The story is cool, but the mech designs and cyberpunk levels are off the charts!
nice bird -- wow that packing is pretty extravagant, was it still cold by the time it got to you??
you know it!! who else?!?! ☺
night :) i'm busted up with a cold so i'm not gonna be much fun; going to bed now too. please, let me dream of Locus Solus HQ :)
do you guys have a safe place to ride out the storm? sounds like time for drinking, board games, candles and some monkeys :)
I hear Yoko Kanno in my dreams... she is a genius, i love those songs... don't even get me going ;)
... are you the one.... the one... they call... The Puppetmaster?
get Fallout 3 instead ;)
doh... well... its a cold night anyways, stay in warm, get some hot food and relax :)
i'm with you on the bubblegum theme; pink stars look cool :)
doh I always do that too, I can never resist the updates; pain, waiting; waiting, pain; reboot, reboot: incompatability, HO!
at that price it's a steal!!
oooh that sounds like a nice night ☺
humm... could you could tunnel your dns through ssh? do you have an outside shell somewhere? i mean, if it's bad enough for tactics
I noticed it has happened also, but with our electric bill; I'm not sure why yet unfortunately ☹
holy sh★t wtf is that on the end, a spray nozzle? "come on baby light my fire (body lube)"
yow... sorry to hear about being sick :( dring some ginger ale, play some RPGs and stay away from daytime TV! :)
doh -- appologies for that pointless tweet, I missed your response; in any case, it still worked great, saved my day actually :)
am I wrong in that the desktop sharing is view-only right now?
I tried DimDim the other day -- it is pretty cool, however, the desktop sharing does not seem to be interactive;it's view-only :(
cool!! whats the URL? :)
museum visit? i'd say an arcade if they still had them ;)
I can't figure out that comic either; can you give me some hints? wealthy guys relax while the ice caps melt?
umm -- you just made my day -- I totally forgot about my old Verbot :)
welcome :)
It wouldn't change my mind, but that DOS t-shirt is just hot no matter the circumstances ☺
for some reason they don't seem to render properly though in Firefox or Opera (at least); is that expected?
I'm always listening here  what is profs chat, anyways? wishing you a relaxing (evening?) 
Oooh I didn't notice yet the new icons in 1.5.1!! Thank you! 
So that's what's been going on over there? I've seen a bunch of huge trailers out front the last few days; any of your art?
Hey where are you located these days?
Count me in on the easy weekend tweets 
I am bummed I missed @freezepop tonight-how was the show? any shark attacks? :)
I feel that way somtimes too; aka: right now. slow night around here 
Yow! are you in NH or Boston? I'm trying to see if anyone knows when power might come back to Nashua, or status of the power grid.
Whoooops sorry I promise it wasn't me!! 
it seems like sagonet is always having power troubles just on some kind of general principle, at least so friends who colo tell me
read Options: The secret life of Steve Jobs; i think you will love it ;)
Thanks for the info :) I actually live in Boston near the airport, but my friend is up on exit 1 RT3; do you have power back yet?
yeargh, I am super jealous; I wanna go so bad; I think I might finally get to vegas in 2010 to see some vows get renewed; CES!!
I believe they have all the original japanese eye 1/2/3; however, they also have forbidden planet! love that one 
I think RE 4 is more like five years ago since original launch 4 gamecube; it is one of the best ever; "what are ya buyin?" a toughy!
let me know how TR goes I'm thinking of trying it out too :)
unfortunately they had it towed to a VW dealership in NA this morning; i feel bad for that kid, he's probably in to get fleeced.
the archaic revival! have you read 'true hallucinations'? if not, go find it! :)
there is also Chao Chow City, the huge late-night neon-sharkfin scorpion bowl coffin; people tell me they have great dim-sum
I like Emperor's Garden the best because it's inside a huge old building in Chinatown which used to be a theater; great dishes!
IMO digg/reddit will need a crew of radical mobile clients to keep up with twitter; so many excellent clients here-it's powerful :)
you seem like a very reasonable person. it is hard to find a deal like that most of the time; I wish I could trade with you!
I think you just made my night by making me think of 'it's a fine day' - crazy keys still give me goosebumps :)
don't make me cry; just missed Adam F in cambridge 2 weeks ago; what are your new cans?
pdanet on cydia works awesome for me %95 of the time; somtimes it drives me batty though; it's still the best I've ever seen :)
good luck; a sensitive heart can be tough sometimes, but time heals many wounds. even when han was carbonited, love returned
fortigate ssl vpn? haven't heard of it yet; is it better than openvpn on linux?
hey thanks for asking! we did resolve it; apparently avg 8 & a w2k3 dc should not be mixed? uninstall&reboot and it went clean out.
At The Shire in Franklin,MA-wow this place is so great ☺
arggghhhhh... gotta drive out to the datacenter :( feeling sick but one of our servers wont come back... out into the cold!
Watching some Atomic Ballroom Calamity vids on YouTube; upgrading ESX; ugh, I think I caught a cold ☹
there is a baseband update contained within for the 3G (not 2G/1stg), but its not supported by jailbreak process; should be soon but no ETA
Again, watching Forbidden Planet and loving every second of it 
Sad day at work; a round of layoffs  it's very somber and I'm feeling frustrated for my buddies; jobs are scary somtimes 
#08icestorm wow am I happy to find this group! does anyone know when power might come back in Nashua? anyone here from near exit 1?
Watching Logan's Run; so this is where a 'sandman kill' comes from? sweet nightclub! that girl Jessica is h.o.t.
Blame: Stay Forever :)
going to sleep; conference call in 6.75 hours; goodnite world, goodnight backup jobs...zzzzzZzzZZZZZZzZZZzzzzZZzzzzZZZZ.. I'm watching you!
anyone ever have trouble starting a 97 vw golf? sisters bf is in a jam; I have made some notes if anyone wants to attempt a diagnosis; thx!
GSM interference from the furnace? at home-home lying in old bed on fast 3g signal; furnace fires; pow: no service! furnace off: love bars..
just getting home from an emergency all nighter; miss my baby, my family & my cat-gotta wake up in 4 hrs; conf call and do it all over again
